mapper.select: select m.m_id, m.m_type, m.m_name, m.m_image, m.m_order, mm.mm_id, mm.mm_name, mm.mm_url, mm.mm_order from sys_module_menu mm inner join sys_module m on mm.ref_m_id = m.m_id where mm.mm_status = 0 and m.m_status = 0 order by m.m_order, mm.mm_order

select distinct m.m_id, m.m_type, m.m_name, m.m_image, m.m_order, mm.mm_id, mm.mm_name, mm.mm_url, mm.mm_order from ( select rm.ref_mm_id from sys_role_menu rm where rm.ref_r_id = #{roleId, jdbcType=INTEGER} ) rm inner join sys_module_menu mm on rm.ref_mm_id = mm.mm_id inner join sys_module m on mm.ref_m_id = m.m_id where mm.mm_status = 0 and m.m_status = 0 order by m.m_order, m.m_name, mm.mm_order

select distinct m.m_id, m.m_type, m.m_name, m.m_image, m.m_order, mm.mm_id, mm.mm_name, mm.mm_url, mm.mm_order from ( select r.* from sys_user_role ur inner join sys_role r on ur.ref_r_id = r.r_id where ur.ref_u_id = #{userId, jdbcType=INTEGER} ) r inner join sys_role_menu rm on r.r_id = rm.ref_r_id inner join sys_module_menu mm on rm.ref_mm_id = mm.mm_id inner join sys_module m on mm.ref_m_id = m.m_id where r.r_status = 0 and mm.mm_status = 0 and m.m_status = 0 order by m.m_order, m.m_name, mm.mm_order
